00011 <script type="text/javascript">
00012 this.addEventListener("load", init, false);
00013 
00014 // Holds the list that the elements are in
00015 var elements;
00016 // Holds the text area that new elements come from
00017 var element;
00018 // Keeps track of the number entered
00019 var count = 0;
00020 
00021 function init() {
00022   var elements_block = document.getElementById("elements");
00023   if(!elements_block) {
00024     alert("Could not find list to add to");
00025   }
00026   elements = document.createElement("ul");
00027   elements_block.appendChild(elements);
00028   element = document.getElementById("new_element");
00029 }
00030 
00031 function add_element() {
00032   if(element.value) {
00033     count++;
00034 
00035     var checkbox = document.createElement("input");
00036     checkbox.setAttribute("name", "id[]");
00037     checkbox.setAttribute("type", "checkbox");
00038     checkbox.setAttribute("checked", "checked");
00039     checkbox.setAttribute("value", count)
00040       
00041     var textbox = document.createElement("input");
00042     textbox.setAttribute("name", "text-" + count);
00043     textbox.setAttribute("id", "text-" + count);
00044     textbox.setAttribute("type", "text");
00045     textbox.setAttribute("value", element.value)
00046 
00047     var listitem = document.createElement("li");
00048     listitem.appendChild(checkbox);
00049     listitem.appendChild(textbox);
00050     elements.appendChild(listitem);
00051 
00052     element.value = "";
00053   }
00054 }
00055 </script>
00056   </head>
00057   <body onload="init()">
00058     <?php if(isset($_GET["id"]) || (isset($_SESSION["vars"]) && count($_SESSION["vars"]) > 0)) { ?>
00059       <ul>
00060         <?php
00061           if(!isset($_SESSION['vars'])) {
00062             $_SESSION['vars'] = array();
00063             print("<h1>Created vars</h1>\n");
00064           }
00065           if(isset($_GET["id"])) {
00066             foreach($_GET["id"] as $count) {
00067               array_push($_SESSION['vars'], $_GET["text-" . $count]);
00068             }
00069           }
00070         ?>
00071         <?php foreach($_SESSION['vars'] as $var) { ?>
00072           <li><?php echo($var) ?></li>
00073         <?php } ?>
00074       </ul>
00075     <?php } ?>
